info.title: Field level maps (with shortcuts)
info.description: GEOSYS™ Map Product APIs provide endpoints for retrieving map image coverage and map generation.

get.description: This API allows to create one new map for specific parameters.

parameters.name: $epsg-out
parameters.description: Output geometries projection code

parameters.name: wktPrecision
parameters.description: Number of decimals in the generated geometries (only for EPSG 900913 or 3857)

parameters.name: directLinks
parameters.description: Enable to disable direct URL to product in the response. When “True” is used only map links will be provided (map, legend, worldfile) When this parameter is not sent the “False” value is used.

parameters.name: headerParameters
parameters.description: Filter

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Filter

parameters.name: $sort
parameters.description: Ordered comma separated list of fields to sort on

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter expression

parameters.name: $fields
parameters.description: Comma separated list of fields to retrieve

parameters.name: $group-by
parameters.description: Ordered comma separated list of fields to group by

parameters.name: $page-groups
parameters.description: Ordered comma separated list of fields to group items on pages by

parameters.name: $column-groups
parameters.description: Ordered comma separated list of fields to group columns by

parameters.name: $row-groups
parameters.description: Ordered comma separated list of fields to group rows by

parameters.name: $offset
parameters.description: Offset in the list to get the first item from

parameters.name: $limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of items to return

parameters.name: $count
parameters.description: Returns number of items with the given filter as header

parameters.name: $offset-including
parameters.description: Calculates $offset automatically to show given item

parameters.name: $format-settings
parameters.description: Input and output format settings

parameters.name: $epsg
parameters.description: Input and output geometries projection code

parameters.name: $epsg-in
parameters.description: Input geometries projection code

parameters.name: $epsg-out
parameters.description: Output geometries projection code

get.description:
This API allows to request specific map by using shortcuts (More information about shortcuts [here](https://geosys.stoplight.io/docs/field-level-maps-1/docs/02-overall.md)) : 

• The image identifier

parameters.name: $epsg-out
parameters.description: Output geometries projection code

parameters.name: wktPrecision
parameters.description: Number of decimals in the generated geometries (only for EPSG 900913 or 3857)

parameters.name: directLinks
parameters.description: Enable to disable direct URL to product in the response. When “True” is used only map links will be provided (map, legend, worldfile) When this parameter is not sent the “False” value is used.

parameters.name: $fields
parameters.description: Comma separated list of fields to retrieve

get.description:
This API allows to request the map by using shortcuts (More information about shortcuts [here](https://geosys.stoplight.io/docs/field-level-maps-1/docs/02-overall.md)) : 

• The image identifier

• The extension

The available extensions are:

• .shp.zip

• .tiff.zip

• .kmz

• .png

parameters.name: $epsg-out
parameters.description: Output geometries projection code

parameters.name: wktPrecision
parameters.description: Number of decimals in the generated geometries (only for EPSG 900913 or 3857)

parameters.name: directLinks
parameters.description: Enable to disable direct URL to product in the response. When “True” is used only map links will be provided (map, legend, worldfile) When this parameter is not sent the “False” value is used.

• The extension

parameters.description: Enable to define size of thumbnail image (square shape)

parameters.description: Output geometries projection code

parameters.name: wktPrecision
parameters.description: Number of decimals in the generated geometries (only for EPSG 900913 or 3857)

parameters.name: directLinks
parameters.description: Enable to disable direct URL to product in the response. When “True” is used only map links will be provided (map, legend, worldfile) When this parameter is not sent the “False” value is used.

get.description:
This API allows to request the world-file in PGW format to locate the map with [shortcuts](https://geosys.stoplight.io/docs/field-level-maps-1/docs/02-overall.md) : 


• The image identifier

• The extension

parameters.name: $epsg-out
parameters.description: Output geometries projection code

parameters.name: wktPrecision
parameters.description: Number of decimals in the generated geometries (only for EPSG 900913 or 3857)

parameters.name: directLinks
parameters.description: Enable to disable direct URL to product in the response. When “True” is used only map links will be provided (map, legend, worldfile) When this parameter is not sent the “False” value is used.

get.description:
This API allows to request [Rx-maps](https://geosys.stoplight.io/docs/field-level-maps-1/swagger_withshortcuts.json/paths/~1maps~1rx-map/post) by using [shortcuts]
(https://geosys.stoplight.io/docs/field-level-maps-1/docs/02-overall.md) : 

• The image identifier

parameters.name: sourceMapId
parameters.description: Identifier from the map on which you want to generate the rx

parameters.name: thumbnailSize
parameters.description: Enable to define size of thumbnail image (square shape)

parameters.name: directLinks
parameters.description: Enable to disable direct URL to product in the response. When “True” is used only map links will be provided (map, legend, worldfile) When this parameter is not sent the “False” value is used.

parameters.name: legendType
parameters.description: The legend type to use. When this parameter is not sent, the “Dynamic” value is used.

parameters.name: zoning
parameters.description: Defined is the zoned map link has to be sent in the response. When this parameter is not sent the “False” value is used.

parameters.name: minZoneSize
parameters.description: Zoning will make sure that the zones generated are bigger than the minZoneSize

parameters.name: wktPrecision
parameters.description: Number of decimals in the generated geometries (only for EPSG 900913 or 3857)

parameters.name: useColorMapForZoning
parameters.description: Values: True or False. Value by default: False. if you provide a ColorMapId, it will be used instead of the default zoning map.

parameters.name: zoneCount
parameters.description: This parameter sets the number of zone for the map to be created (minimum of 1, maximum of 255, no value will not be accepted)

parameters.name: colorMapId
parameters.description: If you provide a ColorMapId, it will be used instead of the default colorMap. There is no verification between ZoneCount & Number of classes in the ColorMap. If you do not have enough colours in your ColorMap, some area will be empty / no color on the png. If your ColorMap contains more colors than your ZoneCount, only the first N classes(N = Zonecount) will be used.

parameters.name: $epsg-out
parameters.description: Output geometries projection code

parameters.name: stripingCorrection
parameters.description: Values: True or False. Value by default: False Correct the striping effect on the image.

parameters.name: zoningSegmentation
parameters.description: This parameter allows to recover point localization by segment Value: None or Polygon. Zoning and zonecount parameters need to be provided

parameters.name: hotSpot
parameters.description:
This parameter allows to recover point localization by zone Values: True or False. Available on those map types: INSEASON_NDVI, INSEASON_EVI, INSEASON_GNDVI, INSEASON_CVI. 
Zoning and zonecount parameters need to be provided

parameters.name: hotSpotPosition
parameters.description: This parameter allows  to choose how to select hotspot

parameters.name: hotSpotFilter
parameters.description: This parameter allows  to select  X top and/or Y bottom hotspots based on the value for the metric. Filter by position

parameters.name: histogram
parameters.description: Display or not the values ​​of the histogram of the map in the response body. Values: True or False.

parameters.name: numberOfBins
parameters.description: This parameter sets the number of classes for the histogram to be created (minimum of 1, maximum of 255)

parameters.name: noteBookSizeX
parameters.description: Enable to define the width of the notebook

parameters.name: noteBookSizeY
parameters.description: Enable to define the height of the notebook

parameters.name: clipping
parameters.description: Indicates how the geometry is clipped, either using the field border, or its bounding box

get.description:
This API allows to request [Rx-maps](https://geosys.stoplight.io/docs/field-level-maps-1/swagger_withshortcuts.json/paths/~1maps~1rx-map/post) image by using [shortcuts](https://geosys.stoplight.io/docs/field-level-maps-1/docs/02-overall.md):

• The image identifier

The available extensions are:

• .shp.zip

• .tiff.zip

• .kmz

• .png

GeosysThe API Design Management Platform powering the world's leading API first companies.geosys.stoplight.io

parameters.description: Identifier from the map on which you want to generate the rx

parameters.name: thumbnailSize
parameters.description: Enable to define size of thumbnail image (square shape)

parameters.name: directLinks
parameters.description: Enable to disable direct URL to product in the response. When “True” is used only map links will be provided (map, legend, worldfile) When this parameter is not sent the “False” value is used.

parameters.name: legendType
parameters.description: The legend type to use. When this parameter is not sent, the “Dynamic” value is used.

parameters.name: zoning
parameters.description: Defined is the zoned map link has to be sent in the response. When this parameter is not sent the “False” value is used.

parameters.name: minZoneSize
parameters.description: Zoning will make sure that the zones generated are bigger than the minZoneSize

parameters.name: wktPrecision
parameters.description: Number of decimals in the generated geometries (only for EPSG 900913 or 3857)

parameters.name: useColorMapForZoning
parameters.description: Values: True or False. Value by default: False. if you provide a ColorMapId, it will be used instead of the default zoning map.

parameters.name: zoneCount
parameters.description: This parameter sets the number of zone for the map to be created (minimum of 1, maximum of 255, no value will not be accepted)

parameters.name: colorMapId
parameters.description: If you provide a ColorMapId, it will be used instead of the default colorMap. There is no verification between ZoneCount & Number of classes in the ColorMap. If you do not have enough colours in your ColorMap, some area will be empty / no color on the png. If your ColorMap contains more colors than your ZoneCount, only the first N classes(N = Zonecount) will be used.

parameters.name: $epsg-out
parameters.description: Output geometries projection code

parameters.name: stripingCorrection
parameters.description: Values: True or False. Value by default: False Correct the striping effect on the image.

parameters.name: zoningSegmentation
parameters.description: This parameter allows to recover point localization by segment Value: None or Polygon. Zoning and zonecount parameters need to be provided

parameters.name: hotSpot
parameters.description:
This parameter allows to recover point localization by zone Values: True or False. Available on those map types: INSEASON_NDVI, INSEASON_EVI, INSEASON_GNDVI, INSEASON_CVI. 
Zoning and zonecount parameters need to be provided

parameters.name: hotSpotPosition
parameters.description: This parameter allows  to choose how to select hotspot

parameters.name: hotSpotFilter
parameters.description: This parameter allows  to select  X top and/or Y bottom hotspots based on the value for the metric. Filter by position

parameters.name: histogram
parameters.description: Display or not the values ​​of the histogram of the map in the response body. Values: True or False.

parameters.name: numberOfBins
parameters.description: This parameter sets the number of classes for the histogram to be created (minimum of 1, maximum of 255)

parameters.name: noteBookSizeX
parameters.description: Enable to define the width of the notebook

parameters.name: noteBookSizeY
parameters.description: Enable to define the height of the notebook

parameters.name: clipping
parameters.description: Indicates how the geometry is clipped, either using the field border, or its bounding box

post.description:
This API allows to generate color composition map for a field or a geometry derived satellite image.

#### This API is based on:

• Season Field Identifiers (GEOSYS ID and/or Customer External ID)

• Map type

This end point can provide different type of result based on the number of band available on the selected image:

• If Blue band is available, it will be a True color composition

• Otherwise it will be a False color composition

Unless other color composition maps are delivered on the bounding box of the field. There is no clipping on field border. This map does not have any legend.

#### This API retrieves:

• URLs to display **the color composition map** in PNG, GEOTIFF, SHAPEFILE and KMZ formats, at 5 m resolution;

• URL to display the map thumbnail file as PNG format

• URL to display the map legend in only available for PNG format;

• URL to display the world-file in PGW format to locate the map;

post.description:
This API allows to display a management zone map for a field or a geometry (optionally based on Coverage API).

#### This API is based on:

• Season Field Identifiers (GEOSYS ID and/or Customer External ID)

• Image dates (optional)

• Zone number

#### This API retrieves:

• URLs to display **the Management zone map** in PNG, GEOTIFF, Shapefile and KMZ formats, at 5 m resolution

• URL to display the map thumbnail file as PNG format
 
• URL to display the map legend in only available for PNG format 

• URL to display the world-file in PGW format to locate the map 

• URL to display the Notebook map as PNG format to locate the map on a Google maps background;

• URL to display the scalebar in PNG format;

• The Histogram values by classes;


#### Two zone creation methods are currently available:

• Standard: 
When image dates are not defined in the request, Geosys Platform will automatically select in the coverage:
  
  **o** 2 wet images
  **o** 2 dry images
  **o** the last one bare soil image.

• Custom: When image dates are including in the request, management zone creation will use only selected images. This allows to specialize management zone creation with a specific business logic: only peak vegetation, only specific year.

If you do not have enough colours in your ColorMap, some area will be empty / no color on the png. If your ColorMap contains more colors than your ZoneCount, only the first N classes(N = Zonecount) will be used.

If you do not have enough colours in your ColorMap, some area will be empty / no color on the png. If your ColorMap contains more colors than your ZoneCount, only the first N classes(N = Zonecount) will be used.

post.description:
This API allows to generate color composition map set for a set of field


#### This API is based on:

• Season Field Identifiers (GEOSYS ID and/or Customer External ID)

• Map type

This end point can provide different type of result based on the number of band available on the selected image:

• If Blue band is available, it will be a True color composition

• Otherwise it will be a False color composition

Unless other color composition maps are delivered on the bounding box of the field. There is no clipping on field border. This map does not have any legend.

#### This API retrieves:

• URLs to display **the color composition maps** in PNG, GEOTIFF, SHAPEFILE and KMZ formats, at 5 m resolution;

• URL to display the map thumbnail file as PNG format

• URL to display the map legend in only available for PNG format;

• URL to display the world-file in PGW format to locate the map;

post.description:
This API allows to display a set of several management zone maps from fields and their geometry (optionally based on Coverage API).

#### This API is based on:

• Season Field Identifiers (GEOSYS ID and/or Customer External ID)

• Image dates (optional)

• Zone number

#### This API retrieves:

• URLs to display **the Management zone maps** in PNG, GEOTIFF, Shapefile and KMZ formats, at 5 m resolution

• URL to display the map thumbnail file as PNG format
 
• URL to display the map legend in only available for PNG format 

• URL to display the world-file in PGW format to locate the map 

• URL to display the Notebook map as PNG format to locate the map on a Google maps background;

• URL to display the scalebar in PNG format;

• The Histogram values by classes;


#### Two zone creation methods are currently available:

• Standard: 
When image dates are not defined in the request, Geosys Platform will automatically select in the coverage:
  
  **o** 2 wet images
  **o** 2 dry images
  **o** the last one bare soil image.

• Custom: When image dates are including in the request, management zone creation will use only selected images. This allows to specialize management zone creation with a specific business logic: only peak vegetation, only specific year.

parameters.description: If you provide a ColorMapId, it will be used instead of the default colorMap. There is no verification between ZoneCount & Number of classes in the ColorMap. If you do not have enough colours in your ColorMap, some area will be empty / no color on the png. If your ColorMap contains more colors than your ZoneCount, only the first N classes(N = Zonecount) will be used.

parameters.description: If you provide a ColorMapId, it will be used instead of the default colorMap. There is no verification between ZoneCount & Number of classes in the ColorMap. If you do not have enough colours in your ColorMap, some area will be empty / no color on the png. If your ColorMap contains more colors than your ZoneCount, only the first N classes(N = Zonecount) will be used.

get.description:
This APIs allow to display coverage for a specific season field identifiers (Geosys Season Field ID).


#### This API retrieves a catalog with the following data:

• Available cloud-free imagery dates for the queried field. By default it will return only for the last 6 months.

• The image id

• Sensor

• Soil material: metadata describing if this is a vegetation image or a bare soil image (in text format);

• Weather type: Metadata describing the weather conditions (in text format). 
The weather type is a metadata that describes the weather conditions at the acquisition date of the image. 

The weather type is linked to the image type (Vegetation or Bare soil) and can be defined as follows :


| Image Type                                                                                                 | Weather type                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | Weather type definition
|------|--------|-----------
| Bare soil| Cold |The seasonal weather at the image acquisition had been **colder than the 30-years average** 
|Bare soil | Hot  | The seasonal weather at the image acquisition had been **warmer than the 30-years average**
                                                                                                                                                                                                        |Vegetation | Wet |The seasonal weather at the image acquisition had been **wetter than the 30-years average**
                                                                                                                                                                                                        |Vegetation | Dry |The seasonal weather at the image acquisition had been **dryer than the 30-years average**\.  
                    
                    
The map types that can be create are : 

•  INSEASON_NDVI

•  INSEASON_EVI

•  INSEASON_CVI

•  INSEASON_GNDVI

•  INSEASONPARTIAL_NDVI and INSEASONPARTIAL_EVI

  => Please see [this article](https://geosys.stoplight.io/docs/field-level-maps-1/docs/In-season-partial-maps.md) for detailed information.
  
•  INSEASON_LAI

•  INSEASONFIELD_AVERAGE_REVERSE_NDVI

•  INSEASONFIELD_AVERAGE_NDVI

•  COLORCOMPOSITION



#### This API retrieves:
                  
                                    
• URLs to display **coverage maps** in PNG, GEOTIFF, Shapefile and KMZ formats, at 5 m resolution;

• URL to display the map thumbnail file as PNG format;

• URL to display the map legend in only available for PNG format;

• URL to display the world-file in PGW format to locate the map;

• URL to display the Notebook map as PNG format to locate the map on a background Google maps ;

• URL to display the scalebar in PNG format;

parameters.description: If you provide a ColorMapId, it will be used instead of the default colorMap. There is no verification between ZoneCount & Number of classes in the ColorMap. If you do not have enough colours in your ColorMap, some area will be empty / no color on the png. If your ColorMap contains more colors than your ZoneCount, only the first N classes(N = Zonecount) will be used.

parameters.name: $epsg-out
parameters.description: Output geometries projection code

parameters.name: stripingCorrection
parameters.description: Values: True or False. Value by default: False Correct the striping effect on the image.

parameters.name: zoningSegmentation
parameters.description: This parameter allows to recover point localization by segment Value: None or Polygon. Zoning and zonecount parameters need to be provided

parameters.name: hotSpot
parameters.description:
This parameter allows to recover point localization by zone Values: True or False. Available on those map types: INSEASON_NDVI, INSEASON_EVI, INSEASON_GNDVI, INSEASON_CVI. 
Zoning and zonecount parameters need to be provided

parameters.name: hotSpotPosition
parameters.description: This parameter allows  to choose how to select hotspot

parameters.name: hotSpotFilter
parameters.description: This parameter allows  to select  X top and/or Y bottom hotspots based on the value for the metric. Filter by position

parameters.name: histogram
parameters.description: Display or not the values ​​of the histogram of the map in the response body. Values: True or False.

parameters.name: numberOfBins
parameters.description: This parameter sets the number of classes for the histogram to be created (minimum of 1, maximum of 255)

parameters.name: noteBookSizeX
parameters.description: Enable to define the width of the notebook

parameters.name: noteBookSizeY
parameters.description: Enable to define the height of the notebook

parameters.name: clipping
parameters.description: Indicates how the geometry is clipped, either using the field border, or its bounding box

get.description:
This API allows to request the world-file in PGW format to locate the map with [shortcuts](https://geosys.stoplight.io/docs/field-level-maps-1/docs/02-overall.md) : 

• The Season Field Identifiers (GEOSYS ID and/or Customer External ID)

• The image date

• The map type


The image reference date can be recovered by using [the Coverage APIs](https://geosys.stoplight.io/docs/field-level-maps-1/swagger_withshortcuts.json/paths/~1season-fields~1{seasonFieldId}~1coverage/get) or  [the catalog imagery APIs](https://geosys.stoplight.io/docs/field-level-maps-1/swagger_withshortcuts.json/paths/~1season-fields~1{seasonFieldId}~1catalog-imagery/get).

The map type are : 

•  INSEASON_NDVI

•  INSEASON_EVI

•  INSEASON_CVI

•  INSEASON_CVIN

•  INSEASON_GNDVI

•  INSEASONPARTIAL_NDVI and INSEASONPARTIAL_EVI

  => Please see [this article](https://geosys.stoplight.io/docs/field-level-maps-1/docs/In-season-partial-maps.md) for detailed information.
  
•  NDVI

•  INSEASON_LAI

parameters.name: seasonFieldId
parameters.description: Season field id

parameters.name: imageReference
parameters.description: Image reference using either the image date or the image id

parameters.name: gain
parameters.description: This parameter allows to multiply a base reference map value with a constant gain factor. Default value : 1

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: This parameter allows to add a constant offset on the base reference map value. Default value : 0

parameters.name: directLinks
parameters.description: Enable to disable direct URL to product in the response. When “True” is used only map links will be provided (map, legend, worldfile) When this parameter is not sent the “False” value is used.

parameters.name: legendType
parameters.description: The legend type to use. When this parameter is not sent, the “Dynamic” value is used.

parameters.name: zoning
parameters.description: Defined is the zoned map link has to be sent in the response. When this parameter is not sent the “False” value is used.

parameters.name: minZoneSize
parameters.description: Zoning will make sure that the zones generated are bigger than the minZoneSize

parameters.name: wktPrecision
parameters.description: Number of decimals in the generated geometries (only for EPSG 900913 or 3857)

parameters.name: useColorMapForZoning
parameters.description: Values: True or False. Value by default: False. if you provide a ColorMapId, it will be used instead of the default zoning map.

parameters.name: zoneCount
parameters.description: This parameter sets the number of zone for the map to be created (minimum of 1, maximum of 255, no value will not be accepted)

parameters.name: colorMapId
parameters.description: If you provide a ColorMapId, it will be used instead of the default colorMap. There is no verification between ZoneCount & Number of classes in the ColorMap. If you do not have enough colours in your ColorMap, some area will be empty / no color on the png. If your ColorMap contains more colors than your ZoneCount, only the first N classes(N = Zonecount) will be used.

parameters.name: $epsg-out
parameters.description: Output geometries projection code

parameters.name: stripingCorrection
parameters.description: Values: True or False. Value by default: False Correct the striping effect on the image.

parameters.name: zoningSegmentation
parameters.description: This parameter allows to recover point localization by segment Value: None or Polygon. Zoning and zonecount parameters need to be provided

parameters.name: hotSpot
parameters.description:
This parameter allows to recover point localization by zone Values: True or False. Available on those map types: INSEASON_NDVI, INSEASON_EVI, INSEASON_GNDVI, INSEASON_CVI. 
Zoning and zonecount parameters need to be provided

parameters.name: hotSpotPosition
parameters.description: This parameter allows  to choose how to select hotspot

parameters.name: hotSpotFilter
parameters.description: This parameter allows  to select  X top and/or Y bottom hotspots based on the value for the metric. Filter by position

parameters.name: histogram
parameters.description: Display or not the values ​​of the histogram of the map in the response body. Values: True or False.

parameters.name: numberOfBins
parameters.description: This parameter sets the number of classes for the histogram to be created (minimum of 1, maximum of 255)

parameters.name: noteBookSizeX
parameters.description: Enable to define the width of the notebook

parameters.name: noteBookSizeY
parameters.description: Enable to define the height of the notebook

parameters.name: clipping
parameters.description: Indicates how the geometry is clipped, either using the field border, or its bounding box

parameters.name: imageReference
parameters.description: Image reference using either the image date or the image id

parameters.name: seasonFieldId
parameters.description: Season field id

parameters.name: thumbnailSize
parameters.description: Enable to define size of thumbnail image (square shape)

parameters.name: directLinks
parameters.description: Enable to disable direct URL to product in the response. When “True” is used only map links will be provided (map, legend, worldfile) When this parameter is not sent the “False” value is used.

parameters.name: $epsg-out
parameters.description: Output geometries projection code

parameters.name: useColorMapForZoning
parameters.description: Values: True or False. Value by default: False. if you provide a ColorMapId, it will be used instead of the default zoning map.

parameters.name: zoneCount
parameters.description: This parameter sets the number of zone for the map to be created (minimum of 1, maximum of 255, no value will not be accepted)

parameters.name: colorMapId
parameters.description: If you provide a ColorMapId, it will be used instead of the default colorMap. There is no verification between ZoneCount & Number of classes in the ColorMap. If you do not have enough colours in your ColorMap, some area will be empty / no color on the png. If your ColorMap contains more colors than your ZoneCount, only the first N classes(N = Zonecount) will be used.

parameters.name: $epsg-out
parameters.description: Output geometries projection code

parameters.name: stripingCorrection
parameters.description: Values: True or False. Value by default: False Correct the striping effect on the image.

parameters.name: zoningSegmentation
parameters.description: This parameter allows to recover point localization by segment Value: None or Polygon. Zoning and zonecount parameters need to be provided

parameters.name: hotSpot
parameters.description:
This parameter allows to recover point localization by zone Values: True or False. Available on those map types: INSEASON_NDVI, INSEASON_EVI, INSEASON_GNDVI, INSEASON_CVI. 
Zoning and zonecount parameters need to be provided

parameters.name: hotSpotPosition
parameters.description: This parameter allows  to choose how to select hotspot

parameters.name: hotSpotFilter
parameters.description: This parameter allows  to select  X top and/or Y bottom hotspots based on the value for the metric. Filter by position

parameters.name: histogram
parameters.description: Display or not the values ​​of the histogram of the map in the response body. Values: True or False.

parameters.name: numberOfBins
parameters.description: This parameter sets the number of classes for the histogram to be created (minimum of 1, maximum of 255)

parameters.name: noteBookSizeX
parameters.description: Enable to define the width of the notebook

parameters.name: noteBookSizeY
parameters.description: Enable to define the height of the notebook

parameters.name: clipping
parameters.description: Indicates how the geometry is clipped, either using the field border, or its bounding box

parameters.name: legendType
parameters.description: The legend type to use. When this parameter is not sent, the “Dynamic” value is used.

parameters.name: zoning
parameters.description: Defined is the zoned map link has to be sent in the response. When this parameter is not sent the “False” value is used.

parameters.name: minZoneSize
parameters.description: Zoning will make sure that the zones generated are bigger than the minZoneSize

parameters.name: wktPrecision
parameters.description: Number of decimals in the generated geometries (only for EPSG 900913 or 3857)

parameters.name: useColorMapForZoning
parameters.description: Values: True or False. Value by default: False. if you provide a ColorMapId, it will be used instead of the default zoning map.

parameters.name: zoneCount
parameters.description: This parameter sets the number of zone for the map to be created (minimum of 1, maximum of 255, no value will not be accepted)

parameters.name: colorMapId
parameters.description: If you provide a ColorMapId, it will be used instead of the default colorMap. There is no verification between ZoneCount & Number of classes in the ColorMap. If you do not have enough colours in your ColorMap, some area will be empty / no color on the png. If your ColorMap contains more colors than your ZoneCount, only the first N classes(N = Zonecount) will be used.

parameters.name: $epsg-out
parameters.description: Output geometries projection code

parameters.name: stripingCorrection
parameters.description: Values: True or False. Value by default: False Correct the striping effect on the image.

parameters.name: zoningSegmentation
parameters.description: This parameter allows to recover point localization by segment Value: None or Polygon. Zoning and zonecount parameters need to be provided

parameters.name: hotSpot
parameters.description:
This parameter allows to recover point localization by zone Values: True or False. Available on those map types: INSEASON_NDVI, INSEASON_EVI, INSEASON_GNDVI, INSEASON_CVI. 
Zoning and zonecount parameters need to be provided

parameters.name: hotSpotPosition
parameters.description: This parameter allows  to choose how to select hotspot

parameters.name: hotSpotFilter
parameters.description: This parameter allows  to select  X top and/or Y bottom hotspots based on the value for the metric. Filter by position

parameters.name: histogram
parameters.description: Display or not the values ​​of the histogram of the map in the response body. Values: True or False.

parameters.name: numberOfBins
parameters.description: This parameter sets the number of classes for the histogram to be created (minimum of 1, maximum of 255)

parameters.name: noteBookSizeX
parameters.description: Enable to define the width of the notebook

parameters.name: noteBookSizeY
parameters.description: Enable to define the height of the notebook

parameters.name: clipping
parameters.description: Indicates how the geometry is clipped, either using the field border, or its bounding box

parameters.name: colorMapId
parameters.description: If you provide a ColorMapId, it will be used instead of the default colorMap. There is no verification between ZoneCount & Number of classes in the ColorMap. If you do not have enough colours in your ColorMap, some area will be empty / no color on the png. If your ColorMap contains more colors than your ZoneCount, only the first N classes(N = Zonecount) will be used.

parameters.name: $epsg-out
parameters.description: Output geometries projection code

parameters.name: stripingCorrection
parameters.description: Values: True or False. Value by default: False Correct the striping effect on the image.

parameters.name: zoningSegmentation
parameters.description: This parameter allows to recover point localization by segment Value: None or Polygon. Zoning and zonecount parameters need to be provided

parameters.name: hotSpot
parameters.description:
This parameter allows to recover point localization by zone Values: True or False. Available on those map types: INSEASON_NDVI, INSEASON_EVI, INSEASON_GNDVI, INSEASON_CVI. 
Zoning and zonecount parameters need to be provided

parameters.name: hotSpotPosition
parameters.description: This parameter allows  to choose how to select hotspot

parameters.name: hotSpotFilter
parameters.description: This parameter allows  to select  X top and/or Y bottom hotspots based on the value for the metric. Filter by position

parameters.name: histogram
parameters.description: Display or not the values ​​of the histogram of the map in the response body. Values: True or False.

parameters.name: numberOfBins
parameters.description: This parameter sets the number of classes for the histogram to be created (minimum of 1, maximum of 255)

parameters.name: noteBookSizeX
parameters.description: Enable to define the width of the notebook

parameters.name: noteBookSizeY
parameters.description: Enable to define the height of the notebook

parameters.name: clipping
parameters.description: Indicates how the geometry is clipped, either using the field border, or its bounding box

get.description:
This API allows to request the model map image by using [Shortcuts](https://geosys.stoplight.io/docs/field-level-maps-1/docs/02-overall.md) : 

• The Season Field Identifiers (GEOSYS ID and/or Customer External ID)

• the image date reference 

• The map Type

• N planned value


The image reference date can be recovered by using [the Coverage APIs](https://geosys.stoplight.io/docs/field-level-maps-1/swagger_withshortcuts.json/paths/~1season-fields~1{seasonFieldId}~1coverage/get) or  [the catalog imagery APIs](https://geosys.stoplight.io/docs/field-level-maps-1/swagger_withshortcuts.json/paths/~1season-fields~1{seasonFieldId}~1catalog-imagery/get).

The map types are :

•  INSEASONCANOPY_N_REVERSE_LAI 

•  INSEASONFIELD_AVERAGE_LAI

•  INSEASONFIELD_AVERAGE_NDVI

•  INSEASONFIELD_AVERAGE_REVERSE_LAI

•  INSEASONFIELD_AVERAGE_REVERSE_NDVI

•  INSEASON_PRECO_N_GENERIC_MODEL_NDVI

•  INSEASON_PRECO_N_GENERIC_MODEL_CVIN

•  INSEASON_PRECO_N_GENERIC_MODEL_LAI

•  INSEASON_PRECO_N_GENERIC_MODEL_INVERSE_NDVI

•  INSEASON_PRECO_N_GENERIC_MODEL_INVERSE_CVIN

•  INSEASON_PRECO_N_GENERIC_MODEL_INVERSE_LAI


The available extensions are:

• .shp.zip

• .tiff

• .kmz

• .png

parameters.name: imageReference
parameters.description: Image reference using either the image date or the image id

parameters.name: nPlanned
parameters.description:
Dose of Nitrogen planned
units depend on User profile.
UK: kg / ha

parameters.name: seasonFieldId
parameters.description: Season field id

parameters.name: gain
parameters.description: This parameter allows to multiply a base reference map value with a constant gain factor. Default value : 1

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: This parameter allows to add a constant offset on the base reference map value. Default value : 0

parameters.name: nMax
parameters.description:
Maximum threshold for the N dose 
Minimum value allowed is 0.
Maximum value allowed is 999.

parameters.name: nMin
parameters.description:
Minimum threshold for the N dose 
Minimum value allowed is 0.
Maximum value allowed is 999.

parameters.name: directLinks
parameters.description: Enable to disable direct URL to product in the response. When “True” is used only map links will be provided (map, legend, worldfile) When this parameter is not sent the “False” value is used.

parameters.name: legendType
parameters.description: The legend type to use. When this parameter is not sent, the “Dynamic” value is used.

parameters.name: zoning
parameters.description: Defined is the zoned map link has to be sent in the response. When this parameter is not sent the “False” value is used.

parameters.name: minZoneSize
parameters.description: Zoning will make sure that the zones generated are bigger than the minZoneSize

parameters.name: wktPrecision
parameters.description: Number of decimals in the generated geometries (only for EPSG 900913 or 3857)

parameters.name: useColorMapForZoning
parameters.description: Values: True or False. Value by default: False. if you provide a ColorMapId, it will be used instead of the default zoning map.

parameters.description: This parameter sets the number of zone for the map to be created (minimum of 1, maximum of 255, no value will not be accepted)

parameters.name: colorMapId

If you do not have enough colours in your ColorMap, some area will be empty / no color on the png. If your ColorMap contains more colors than your ZoneCount, only the first N classes(N = Zonecount) will be used.

parameters.description: Output geometries projection code

parameters.name: stripingCorrection
parameters.description: Values: True or False. Value by default: False Correct the striping effect on the image.

parameters.name: zoningSegmentation
parameters.description: This parameter allows to recover point localization by segment Value: None or Polygon. Zoning and zonecount parameters need to be provided

parameters.name: hotSpot
parameters.description:
This parameter allows to recover point localization by zone Values: True or False. Available on those map types: INSEASON_NDVI, INSEASON_EVI, INSEASON_GNDVI, INSEASON_CVI. 
Zoning and zonecount parameters need to be provided

parameters.name: hotSpotPosition
parameters.description: This parameter allows  to choose how to select hotspot

parameters.name: hotSpotFilter
parameters.description: This parameter allows  to select  X top and/or Y bottom hotspots based on the value for the metric. Filter by position

parameters.name: histogram
parameters.description: Display or not the values ​​of the histogram of the map in the response body. Values: True or False.

parameters.name: numberOfBins
parameters.description: This parameter sets the number of classes for the histogram to be created (minimum of 1, maximum of 255)

parameters.name: noteBookSizeX
parameters.description: Enable to define the width of the notebook

parameters.name: noteBookSizeY
parameters.description: Enable to define the height of the notebook

• The map Type

The image reference date can be recovered by using [the Coverage APIs](https://geosys.stoplight.io/docs/field-level-maps-1/swagger_withshortcuts.json/paths/~1season-fields~1{seasonFieldId}~1coverage/get) or  [the catalog imagery APIs](https://geosys.stoplight.io/docs/field-level-maps-1/swagger_withshortcuts.json/paths/~1season-fields~1{seasonFieldId}~1catalog-imagery/get).

The map types are :

•  INSEASONCANOPY_N_REVERSE_LAI 

•  INSEASONFIELD_AVERAGE_LAI

•  INSEASONFIELD_AVERAGE_NDVI

•  INSEASONFIELD_AVERAGE_REVERSE_LAI

•  INSEASONFIELD_AVERAGE_REVERSE_NDVI

•  INSEASON_PRECO_N_GENERIC_MODEL_NDVI

•  INSEASON_PRECO_N_GENERIC_MODEL_CVIN

•  INSEASON_PRECO_N_GENERIC_MODEL_LAI

•  INSEASON_PRECO_N_GENERIC_MODEL_INVERSE_NDVI

•  INSEASON_PRECO_N_GENERIC_MODEL_INVERSE_CVIN

•  INSEASON_PRECO_N_GENERIC_MODEL_INVERSE_LAI

parameters.name: imageReference
parameters.description: Image reference using either the image date or the image id

parameters.name: nPlanned
parameters.description:
Dose of Nitrogen planned
units depend on User profile.
UK: kg / ha

parameters.name: seasonFieldId
parameters.description: Season field id

parameters.name: gain
parameters.description: This parameter allows to multiply a base reference map value with a constant gain factor. Default value : 1

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: This parameter allows to add a constant offset on the base reference map value. Default value : 0

parameters.name: nMax
parameters.description:
Maximum threshold for the N dose 
Minimum value allowed is 0.
Maximum value allowed is 999.

parameters.name: nMin
parameters.description:
Minimum threshold for the N dose 
Minimum value allowed is 0.
Maximum value allowed is 999.

parameters.name: directLinks
parameters.description: Enable to disable direct URL to product in the response. When “True” is used only map links will be provided (map, legend, worldfile) When this parameter is not sent the “False” value is used.

parameters.name: legendType
parameters.description: The legend type to use. When this parameter is not sent, the “Dynamic” value is used.

parameters.name: zoning
parameters.description: Defined is the zoned map link has to be sent in the response. When this parameter is not sent the “False” value is used.

parameters.name: minZoneSize
parameters.description: Zoning will make sure that the zones generated are bigger than the minZoneSize

parameters.name: wktPrecision
parameters.description: Number of decimals in the generated geometries (only for EPSG 900913 or 3857)

parameters.name: useColorMapForZoning
parameters.description: Values: True or False. Value by default: False. if you provide a ColorMapId, it will be used instead of the default zoning map.

parameters.name: zoneCount
parameters.description: This parameter sets the number of zone for the map to be created (minimum of 1, maximum of 255, no value will not be accepted)

parameters.name: colorMapId
parameters.description: If you provide a ColorMapId, it will be used instead of the default colorMap. There is no verification between ZoneCount & Number of classes in the ColorMap. If you do not have enough colours in your ColorMap, some area will be empty / no color on the png. If your ColorMap contains more colors than your ZoneCount, only the first N classes(N = Zonecount) will be used.

parameters.name: $epsg-out
parameters.description: Output geometries projection code

parameters.name: stripingCorrection
parameters.description: Values: True or False. Value by default: False Correct the striping effect on the image.

parameters.name: zoningSegmentation
parameters.description: This parameter allows to recover point localization by segment Value: None or Polygon. Zoning and zonecount parameters need to be provided

parameters.name: hotSpot
parameters.description:
This parameter allows to recover point localization by zone Values: True or False. Available on those map types: INSEASON_NDVI, INSEASON_EVI, INSEASON_GNDVI, INSEASON_CVI. 
Zoning and zonecount parameters need to be provided

parameters.name: hotSpotPosition
parameters.description: This parameter allows  to choose how to select hotspot

parameters.name: hotSpotFilter
parameters.description: This parameter allows  to select  X top and/or Y bottom hotspots based on the value for the metric. Filter by position

parameters.name: histogram
parameters.description: Display or not the values ​​of the histogram of the map in the response body. Values: True or False.

parameters.name: numberOfBins
parameters.description: This parameter sets the number of classes for the histogram to be created (minimum of 1, maximum of 255)

parameters.name: noteBookSizeX
parameters.description: Enable to define the width of the notebook

parameters.name: noteBookSizeY
parameters.description: Enable to define the height of the notebook

parameters.name: clipping
parameters.description: Indicates how the geometry is clipped, either using the field border, or its bounding box

get.description:
This API allows to request the yiel goal map scalebar in PNG format by using [Shortcuts](https://geosys.stoplight.io/docs/field-level-maps-1/docs/02-overall.md) : 

• The Season Field Identifiers (GEOSYS ID and/or Customer External ID)

• The image date

• The map Type

• Historical yield average – Min 0, Max 999 (without unit)

• Minimum yield value – Mandatory value; Min 0, Max 999 (without unit)

• Maximum yield value – Mandatory value ; Min 0, Max 999 (without unit)

The image reference date can be recovered by using [the Coverage APIs](https://geosys.stoplight.io/docs/field-level-maps-1/swagger_withshortcuts.json/paths/~1season-fields~1{seasonFieldId}~1coverage/get) or  [the catalog imagery APIs](https://geosys.stoplight.io/docs/field-level-maps-1/swagger_withshortcuts.json/paths/~1season-fields~1{seasonFieldId}~1catalog-imagery/get).

The map type are :

•  YGM

parameters.name: imageReference
parameters.description: Image reference using either the image date or the image id

parameters.name: seasonFieldId
parameters.description: Season field id

parameters.name: directLinks
parameters.description: Enable to disable direct URL to product in the response. When “True” is used only map links will be provided (map, legend, worldfile) When this parameter is not sent the “False” value is used.

parameters.name: legendType
parameters.description: The legend type to use. When this parameter is not sent, the “Dynamic” value is used.

parameters.name: zoning
parameters.description: Defined is the zoned map link has to be sent in the response. When this parameter is not sent the “False” value is used.

parameters.name: minZoneSize
parameters.description: Zoning will make sure that the zones generated are bigger than the minZoneSize

parameters.name: wktPrecision
parameters.description: Number of decimals in the generated geometries (only for EPSG 900913 or 3857)

parameters.name: useColorMapForZoning
parameters.description: Values: True or False. Value by default: False. if you provide a ColorMapId, it will be used instead of the default zoning map.

parameters.name: zoneCount
parameters.description: This parameter sets the number of zone for the map to be created (minimum of 1, maximum of 255, no value will not be accepted)

parameters.name: colorMapId
parameters.description: If you provide a ColorMapId, it will be used instead of the default colorMap. There is no verification between ZoneCount & Number of classes in the ColorMap. If you do not have enough colours in your ColorMap, some area will be empty / no color on the png. If your ColorMap contains more colors than your ZoneCount, only the first N classes(N = Zonecount) will be used.

parameters.name: $epsg-out
parameters.description: Output geometries projection code

parameters.name: stripingCorrection
parameters.description: Values: True or False. Value by default: False Correct the striping effect on the image.

parameters.name: zoningSegmentation
parameters.description: This parameter allows to recover point localization by segment Value: None or Polygon. Zoning and zonecount parameters need to be provided

parameters.name: hotSpot
parameters.description:
This parameter allows to recover point localization by zone Values: True or False. Available on those map types: INSEASON_NDVI, INSEASON_EVI, INSEASON_GNDVI, INSEASON_CVI. 
Zoning and zonecount parameters need to be provided

parameters.name: hotSpotPosition
parameters.description: This parameter allows  to choose how to select hotspot

parameters.name: hotSpotFilter
parameters.description: This parameter allows  to select  X top and/or Y bottom hotspots based on the value for the metric. Filter by position

parameters.name: histogram
parameters.description: Display or not the values ​​of the histogram of the map in the response body. Values: True or False.

parameters.name: numberOfBins
parameters.description: This parameter sets the number of classes for the histogram to be created (minimum of 1, maximum of 255)

parameters.name: noteBookSizeX
parameters.description: Enable to define the width of the notebook

parameters.name: noteBookSizeY
parameters.description: Enable to define the height of the notebook

parameters.name: clipping
parameters.description: Indicates how the geometry is clipped, either using the field border, or its bounding box

get.description:
This API allows to request the Management zones map thumbnail in PNG format by using [Shortcuts](https://geosys.stoplight.io/docs/field-level-maps-1/docs/02-overall.md) : 

• The Season Field Identifiers (GEOSYS ID and/or Customer External ID)

• The map type

The map type is : 

• SAMZ

parameters.name: seasonFieldId
parameters.description: Season field id

parameters.name: colorMapId
parameters.description: If you provide a ColorMapId, it will be used instead of the default colorMap. There is no verification between ZoneCount & Number of classes in the ColorMap. If you do not have enough colours in your ColorMap, some area will be empty / no color on the png. If your ColorMap contains more colors than your ZoneCount, only the first N classes(N = Zonecount) will be used.

parameters.name: numberOfBins
parameters.description: This parameter sets the number of classes for the histogram to be created (minimum of 1, maximum of 255)

parameters.name: noteBookSizeX
parameters.description: Enable to define the width of the notebook

parameters.name: noteBookSizeY
parameters.description: Enable to define the height of the notebook

parameters.description: The legend type to use. When this parameter is not sent, the “Dynamic” value is used.

parameters.description: Defined is the zoned map link has to be sent in the response. When this parameter is not sent the “False” value is used.

parameters.description: Zoning will make sure that the zones generated are bigger than the minZoneSize

parameters.name: wktPrecision
parameters.description: Number of decimals in the generated geometries (only for EPSG 900913 or 3857)

parameters.name: useColorMapForZoning

parameters.name: stripingCorrection
parameters.description: Values: True or False. Value by default: False Correct the striping effect on the image.

parameters.name: zoningSegmentation
parameters.description: This parameter allows to recover point localization by segment Value: None or Polygon. Zoning and zonecount parameters need to be provided

parameters.name: hotSpot
parameters.description:
This parameter allows to recover point localization by zone Values: True or False. Available on those map types: INSEASON_NDVI, INSEASON_EVI, INSEASON_GNDVI, INSEASON_CVI. 
Zoning and zonecount parameters need to be provided

parameters.name: hotSpotPosition
parameters.description: This parameter allows  to choose how to select hotspot

parameters.name: hotSpotFilter
parameters.description: This parameter allows  to select  X top and/or Y bottom hotspots based on the value for the metric. Filter by position

parameters.name: histogram
parameters.description: Display or not the values ​​of the histogram of the map in the response body. Values: True or False.

parameters.name: numberOfBins
parameters.description: This parameter sets the number of classes for the histogram to be created (minimum of 1, maximum of 255)

parameters.name: noteBookSizeX
parameters.description: Enable to define the width of the notebook

parameters.name: noteBookSizeY
parameters.description: Enable to define the height of the notebook

parameters.name: clipping
parameters.description: Indicates how the geometry is clipped, either using the field border, or its bounding box

parameters.name: seasonFieldId
parameters.description: Season field id

parameters.name: thumbnailSize
parameters.description: Enable to define size of thumbnail image (square shape)

parameters.name: directLinks
parameters.description: Enable to disable direct URL to product in the response. When “True” is used only map links will be provided (map, legend, worldfile) When this parameter is not sent the “False” value is used.

parameters.name: legendType
parameters.description: The legend type to use. When this parameter is not sent, the “Dynamic” value is used.

parameters.name: zoning
parameters.description: Defined is the zoned map link has to be sent in the response. When this parameter is not sent the “False” value is used.

parameters.name: minZoneSize
parameters.description: Zoning will make sure that the zones generated are bigger than the minZoneSize

parameters.name: wktPrecision
parameters.description: Number of decimals in the generated geometries (only for EPSG 900913 or 3857)

parameters.name: useColorMapForZoning
parameters.description: Values: True or False. Value by default: False. if you provide a ColorMapId, it will be used instead of the default zoning map.

parameters.name: zoneCount
parameters.description: This parameter sets the number of zone for the map to be created (minimum of 1, maximum of 255, no value will not be accepted)

parameters.name: colorMapId
parameters.description: If you provide a ColorMapId, it will be used instead of the default colorMap. There is no verification between ZoneCount & Number of classes in the ColorMap. If you do not have enough colours in your ColorMap, some area will be empty / no color on the png. If your ColorMap contains more colors than your ZoneCount, only the first N classes(N = Zonecount) will be used.

parameters.description: Values: True or False. Value by default: False Correct the striping effect on the image.

parameters.name: zoningSegmentation
parameters.description: This parameter allows to recover point localization by segment Value: None or Polygon. Zoning and zonecount parameters need to be provided

parameters.name: hotSpot
parameters.description:
This parameter allows to recover point localization by zone Values: True or False. Available on those map types: INSEASON_NDVI, INSEASON_EVI, INSEASON_GNDVI, INSEASON_CVI. 
Zoning and zonecount parameters need to be provided

parameters.name: hotSpotPosition
parameters.description: This parameter allows  to choose how to select hotspot

parameters.name: hotSpotFilter
parameters.description: This parameter allows  to select  X top and/or Y bottom hotspots based on the value for the metric. Filter by position

parameters.name: histogram
parameters.description: Display or not the values ​​of the histogram of the map in the response body. Values: True or False.

parameters.name: numberOfBins
parameters.description: This parameter sets the number of classes for the histogram to be created (minimum of 1, maximum of 255)

parameters.name: noteBookSizeX
parameters.description: Enable to define the width of the notebook

parameters.name: noteBookSizeY
parameters.description: Enable to define the height of the notebook

parameters.name: clipping
parameters.description: Indicates how the geometry is clipped, either using the field border, or its bounding box

get.description:
This APIs allow to display coverage for a specfic season field id.


#### This API retrieves a catalog with the following data:

• Available cloud-free imagery dates for the queried field. By default it will return only for the last 6 months.

• The image id

• Sensor

• Soil material: metadata describing if this is a vegetation image or a bare soil image (in text format);

• Weather type: Metadata describing the weather conditions (in text format). 
The weather type is a metadata that describes the weather conditions at the acquisition date of the image. 

The weather type is linked to the image type (Vegetation or Bare soil) and can be defined as follows :


| Image Type                                                                                                 | Weather type                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | Weather type definition
|------|--------|-----------
| Bare soil| Cold |The seasonal weather at the image acquisition had been **colder than the 30-years average** 
|Bare soil | Hot  | The seasonal weather at the image acquisition had been **warmer than the 30-years average**
                                                                                                                                                                                                        |Vegetation | Wet |The seasonal weather at the image acquisition had been **wetter than the 30-years average**
                                                                                                                                                                                                        |Vegetation | Dry |The seasonal weather at the image acquisition had been **dryer than the 30-years average**\.  
                    
The map types that can be create are : 

•  INSEASON_NDVI

•  INSEASON_EVI

•  INSEASON_CVI

•  INSEASON_GNDVI

•  INSEASONPARTIAL_NDVI and INSEASONPARTIAL_EVI

  => Please see [this article](https://geosys.stoplight.io/docs/field-level-maps-1/docs/In-season-partial-maps.md) for detailed information.
  
•  INSEASON_LAI

•  INSEASONFIELD_AVERAGE_REVERSE_NDVI

•  INSEASONFIELD_AVERAGE_NDVI

•  COLORCOMPOSITION



#### This API retrieves:                    
                    
                    
• URLs to display **coverage maps** in PNG, GEOTIFF, Shapefile and KMZ formats, at 5 m resolution;

• URL to display the map thumbnail file as PNG format;

• URL to display the map legend in only available for PNG format;

• URL to display the world-file in PGW format to locate the map;

• URL to display the Notebook map as PNG format to locate the map on a background Google maps ;

• URL to display the scalebar in PNG format;
